Title: Install Nginx + PHP-FPM + Maria-DB
Description:
Installation

sudo apt install -y nginx php5 php5-cli php5-fpm
sudo apt install -y software-properties-common
sudo apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 0xcbcb082a1bb943db
sudo add-apt-repository 'deb http://nwps.ws/pub/mariadb/repo/10.1/ubuntu trusty main'
sudo apt update
sudo apt install -y mariadb-server

Test

Nginx + PHP

lynx http://localhost

MariaDB

mysql -u root -ppassword
